title: Looking for a retro 70s disco font
content: hi, just wondering if anyone could tell me where i might find a good retro 70's disco font, thanks in advance!
author: dj boss

comments.content: I like ITC Serif Gothic. BTW Show us samples of what you're talking about …

Have you tried doing keyword searches on MyFonts?

disco:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=disco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184422/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=disco "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=disco")

70s, disco:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=70s%2C+disco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184422/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=70s%2C+disco "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=70s%2C+disco")

yep, i love serif gothic as well poms

if you're after a 'freebie', then [alba](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184422/http:/x1brettstuff.blogspot.com/2008/02/free-fun-fonts.html) is one of my recent 'finds'

If you are willing to wait for a few months then SteadyRockin might be your best bet...  
Funky, loopy, swirly and OpenType all in one package...CAN YOU DIG IT...Cause I Can!

[http://type.akofa.com/steadyrockin/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184422/http:/type.akofa.com/steadyrockin/index.html "http://type.akofa.com/steadyrockin/index.html")
